Message.Title: Satchel Paige once said “Don’t look back. Something might be gaining on you.”
Message.Msg: And with that we have the federal government's "Insider Threat" program where all federal employees (regardless of agency) are directed (under penalty of law for failure to comply) " to report suspicious actions of their colleagues based on behavioral profiling techniques ..." This program was mandated in an October 2011 executive order after the famous "Wiki Leaks" affair. So let me get this straight, we have Jane who works for the "endangered microbes" section of the environmental protection agency, spending a good portion of her day watching, documenting and reporting suspicious actions of her colleagues based on a behavioral profile list provided to her by her boss, and if she fails to report her colleagues based on this behavioral profile list provided to her by her boss, she will go to jail. Now some may say that this is a bad thing, but I am not one, because you see, as long as Jane is busy watching, documenting and reporting suspicious actions of her colleagues based on a behavioral profile list provided to her by her boss, she will have less time to be involved with the regulating of the lives of regular citizens, and for that I think we can all be grateful. So I for one would like to offer my thanks to our "dear leader" who truly is the gift that keeps on giving. "In your heart you know he is right." The Frogg

Topic.Title: ... Congrats to Chicago & State of Illinois ..

Message.Msg: As I read the Constitution, I find nothing about a citizen needing a permit. The Constitution itself IS a permit.

Please correct me if I am wrong but I believe that it takes three days to record your purchase of a stock. So doesn't that mean that you are not a "stockholder of record" until 3 days after you buy a stock?
T's Investor Relations web site shows today as the dividend record date. Ex-dividend was the 8th.
When is the day of record ?

Topic.Title: ... Congrats to Chicago & State of Illinois ..

Message.Msg: "criminals prefer unarmed victims" the zimmerman martin case is going on right now, you got it right on that. So now we have the situation of who is quicker on the draw, just like in Gunsmoke, because everyone can claim self defense and say what "could happen next" is reason enough to kill someone.

Here is an example: Declaration Date Ex-Dividend Date Record Date Payable Date 7/27/2004 8/6/2004 8/10/2004 9/10/2004 On July 27, 2004, Company XYZ declares a dividend payable on September 10, 2004 to its shareholders. XYZ also announces that shareholders of record on the company's books on or before August 10, 2004 are entitled to the dividend. The stock would then go ex-dividend two business days before the record date.

Message.Title: Big Brother is bad business!
Message.Msg: Wonder why nobody ever answers e-mails or text messages anymore??????????????????????????? I never snub a U.S. snail mail letter, and I don't put the junk mail companies on my S--- list either. E-mail is here to stay but its living in a world that wants to use as little of it as possible. The last thing I want to do is upgrade anything. I want out. I'd like to find a replacement. This system is a house of cards waiting for a new kind of competition to blow it over.
You can stick you thumb up your #$%$ all day, I'm not going to argue with as butt kisser writing his future employer a resume.
Uncle Red said this would happen. He was right.

Correct neeljak .. the proof is already in the "puddin" .. citing 'facebook" and any site that encourages ones personal profile to be posted on-line, to share with ones new 'internet friends' .... including ones fututre or current bosses !! I let the USPS junk mail (revenue) continue to flow, as a gesture to keep the P.O. afloat .. (for the little good that it does ??)
Yes wilkes. you are correct on "3 days" .. On the surface it's confusing .. but the info can be found at 'investopedia' or other sites under "explanation of terms"

Message.Msg: Constitution? We don't need no stinkin' Constitution.. We had a "Decider" with George Bush and we now have a dictator with liver lips. He's issued more illegal "Executive Orders" than all preceding Presidents.
